00270 template <class Element>
00271 TVarMatrix<Element>::TVarMatrix(const TVarVector<Element>& vector, bool isTransposed)
00272 {
00273        if (isTransposed){
00274               DeepCopy(vector.GetElements(), istd::CIndex2d(vector.GetElementsCount(), 1));
00275        }
00276        else{
00277               DeepCopy(vector.GetElements(), istd::CIndex2d(1, vector.GetElementsCount()));
00278        }
00279 }

00285 void TVarMatrix<Element>::Clear()
00286 {
00287        istd::CIndex2d size = GetSizes();
00288 
00289        istd::CIndex2d index;
00290        for (index[1] = 0; index[1] < size[1]; ++index[1]){
00291               for (index[0] = 0; index[0] < size[0]; ++index[0]){
00292                      SetAt(index, 0);
00293               }
00294     }
00295 }

00298 template <class Element>
00299 void TVarMatrix<Element>::InitToIdentity(int size)
00300 {
00301     SetSizes(istd::CIndex2d(size, size));
00302 
00303        Clear();
00304 
00305        for (int index = 0; index < size; ++index){
00306         SetAt(istd::CIndex2d(index, index), 1);
00307        }

00311 template <class Element>
00312 Element TVarMatrix<Element>::GetMaxElement() const
00313 {
00314        if (IsEmpty()){
00315               return 0;
00316        }
00317 
00318        istd::CIndex2d index(0, 0);
00319        Element retVal = GetAt(index);
00320 
00321        for (index[1] = 0; index[1] < size[1]; ++index[1]){
00322               for (index[0] = 0; index[0] < size[0]; ++index[0]){
00323                      const Element& value = GetAt(index);
00324 
00325                      if (value > retVal){
00326                             retVal = value;
00327                      }
00328               }
00329     }
00330 
00331        return retVal;
00332 }

00346               for (index[0] = 0; index[0] < size[0]; ++index[0]){
00347                      const Element& value = GetAt(index);
00348 
00349                      if (value < retVal){
00350                             retVal = value;
00351                      }
00352               }
00353     }
00354 
00355        return retVal;
00356 }

00359 template <class Element>
00360 void TVarMatrix<Element>::GetNegated(TVarMatrix<Element>& result)
00361 {

00363 
00364        result.SetSizes(size);
00365 
00366        istd::CIndex2d index;

00368               for (index[0] = 0; index[0] < size[0]; ++index[0]){
00369                      result.SetAt(index, -GetAt(index));

00375 template <class Element>
00376 void TVarMatrix<Element>::GetAdded(const TVarMatrix<Element>& matrix, TVarMatrix<Element>& result) const
00377 {
00378        istd::CIndex2d size = GetSizes();
00379        I_ASSERT(size == matrix.GetSizes());
00380 
00381        result.SetSizes(size);
00382 
00383        istd::CIndex2d index;
00384        for (index[1] = 0; index[1] < size[1]; ++index[1]){
00385               for (index[0] = 0; index[0] < size[0]; ++index[0]){
00386                      result.SetAt(index, GetAt(index) + matrix.GetAt(index));
00387               }
00388        }
00389 }

00392 template <class Element>
00393 void TVarMatrix<Element>::GetSubstracted(const TVarMatrix<Element>& matrix, TVarMatrix<Element>& result) const
00394 {
00395        istd::CIndex2d size = GetSizes();
00396        I_ASSERT(size == matrix.GetSizes());
00397 
00398        result.SetSizes(size);
00399 
00400        istd::CIndex2d index;
00401        for (index[1] = 0; index[1] < size[1]; ++index[1]){
00402               for (index[0] = 0; index[0] < size[0]; ++index[0]){
00403                      result.SetAt(index, GetAt(index) - matrix.GetAt(index));
00404               }
00405        }
00406 }

00409 template <class Element>
00410 void TVarMatrix<Element>::GetMultiplied(const TVarMatrix<Element>& matrix, TVarMatrix<Element>& result) const
00411 {
00412        istd::CIndex2d matrixSize = matrix.GetSizes();
00413        istd::CIndex2d size = GetSizes();
00414     I_ASSERT(size[0] == matrixSize[1]);
00415 
00416     Element sum;
00417 
00418     result.SetSizes(istd::CIndex2d(matrixSize[0], size[1]));
00419 
00420        istd::CIndex2d index;
00421        istd::CIndex2d matrixIndex;
00422        istd::CIndex2d resultIndex;
00423 
00424     for (resultIndex[1] = 0; resultIndex[1] < size[1]; ++resultIndex[1]){
00425               index[1] = resultIndex[1];
00426 
00427               for (resultIndex[0] = 0; resultIndex[0] < matrixSize[0]; ++resultIndex[0]){
00428                      matrixIndex[0] = resultIndex[0];
00429 
00430                      for (index[0] = 0; index[0] < size[0]; ++index[0]){
00431                             matrixIndex[1] = index[0];
00432 
00433                             sum += GetAt(index) * matrix.GetAt(matrixIndex);
00434             }
00435 
00436                      result.SetAt(resultIndex, sum);
00437         }
00438     }
00439 }

00442 template <class Element>
00443 void TVarMatrix<Element>::GetScaled(Element value, TVarMatrix<Element>& result) const
00444 {
00445        istd::CIndex2d size = GetSizes();
00446 
00447        result.SetSizes(size);
00448 
00449        istd::CIndex2d index;
00450        for (index[1] = 0; index[1] < size[1]; ++index[1]){
00451               for (index[0] = 0; index[0] < size[0]; ++index[0]){
00452                      result.SetAt(index, GetAt(index) * value);
00453               }
00454     }
00455 }

00458 template <class Element>
00459 void TVarMatrix<Element>::GetTransposed(TVarMatrix<Element>& result) const
00460 {
00461        istd::CIndex2d size = GetSizes();
00462 
00463        result.SetSizes(istd::CIndex2d(size[1], size[0]));
00464 
00465        istd::CIndex2d index;
00466        istd::CIndex2d transposedIndex;
00467        for (index[0] = 0; index[0] < size[0]; ++index[0]){
00468               transposedIndex[1] = index[0];
00469               for (index[1] = 0; index[1] < size[1]; ++index[1]){
00470                      transposedIndex[0] = index[1];
00471 
00472                      result.SetAt(transposedIndex, GetAt(index));
00473         }
00474     }
00475 }

00478 template <class Element>
00479 double TVarMatrix<Element>::GetEuclideanNorm2() const
00480 {
00481        double retVal = 0.0;
00482 
00483        istd::CIndex2d index;
00484        for (index[1] = 0; index[1] < size[1]; ++index[1]){
00485               for (index[0] = 0; index[0] < size[0]; ++index[0]){
00486                      const Element& value = GetAt(index);
00487                      result += double(value * value);
00488               }
00489     }
00490        return retVal;
00491 }

00494 template <class Element>
00495 double TVarMatrix<Element>::GetEuclideanNorm() const
00496 {
00497        return std::sqrt(GetEuclideanNorm2());
00498 }

00500 
00501 template <class Element>
00502 bool TVarMatrix<Element>::GetTriangleDecomposed(
00503                             TVarMatrix<Element>& result,
00504                             const TVarMatrix<Element>* matrix2Ptr,
00505                             TVarMatrix<Element>* result2Ptr,
00506                             int maxColumns,
00507                             Element minHhNorm) const
00508 {
00509        I_ASSERT((matrix2Ptr == NULL) == (result2Ptr == NULL));
00510 
00511        istd::CIndex2d size = GetSizes();
00512 
00513        int matrix2ColumnsCount = 0;
00514        if (matrix2Ptr != NULL){
00515               I_ASSERT(matrix2Ptr->GetSize(1) == size[1]);
00516 
00517               if (matrix2Ptr != result2Ptr){
00518                      *result2Ptr = *matrix2Ptr;
00519               }
00520 
00521               matrix2ColumnsCount = matrix2Ptr->GetSize(0);
00522        }
00523 
00524        if (&result != this){
00525               result = *this;
00526        }
00527 
00528        int columnsCount = istd::Min(size[1] - 1, size[0]);
00529        if ((maxColumns >= 0) && (maxColumns < columnsCount)){
00530               columnsCount = maxColumns;
00531        }
00532 
00533        for (int hhIndex = 0; hhIndex < columnsCount; ++hhIndex){
00534               Element hhNorm = 0;
00535               for (istd::CIndex2d normIndex(hhIndex, hhIndex); normIndex[1] < size[1]; ++normIndex[1]){
00536                      Element element = result.GetAt(normIndex);
00537 
00538                      hhNorm += element * element;
00539               }
00540 
00541               if (hhNorm < minHhNorm){
00542                      return false;
00543               }
00544 
00545               double element0 = result[istd::CIndex2d(hhIndex, hhIndex)];
00546 
00547               double hhLength = (element0 >= 0)? std::sqrt(hhNorm): -sqrt(hhNorm);
00548 
00549               double hhVector0 = element0 + hhLength;
00550               double hhVectorNorm2 = hhNorm + hhVector0 * hhVector0 - element0 * element0;
00551 
00552               if (result2Ptr != NULL){
00553                      istd::CIndex2d matrix2Index;
00554                      for (matrix2Index[0] = 0; matrix2Index[0] < matrix2ColumnsCount; ++matrix2Index[0]){
00555                             matrix2Index[1] = hhIndex;
00556                             double dotProduct = result2Ptr->GetAt(matrix2Index) * hhVector0;
00557                             for (++matrix2Index[1]; matrix2Index[1] < size[1]; ++matrix2Index[1]){
00558                                    dotProduct += result2Ptr->GetAt(matrix2Index) * result[istd::CIndex2d(hhIndex, matrix2Index[1])];
00559                             }
00560 
00561                             double reflexionFactor = 2 * dotProduct / hhVectorNorm2;
00562                             matrix2Index[1] = hhIndex;
00563                             result2Ptr->GetAtRef(matrix2Index) -= hhVector0 * reflexionFactor;
00564                             for (matrix2Index[1]++; matrix2Index[1] < size[1]; ++matrix2Index[1]){
00565                                    result2Ptr->GetAtRef(matrix2Index) -= result.GetAt(istd::CIndex2d(hhIndex, matrix2Index[1])) * reflexionFactor;
00566                             }
00567                      }
00568               }
00569 
00570               istd::CIndex2d matrixIndex;
00571               for (matrixIndex[0] = hhIndex + 1; matrixIndex[0] < size[0]; ++matrixIndex[0]){
00572                      matrixIndex[1] = hhIndex;
00573                      double dotProduct = result[matrixIndex] * hhVector0;
00574                      for (matrixIndex[1]++; matrixIndex[1] < size[1]; ++matrixIndex[1]){
00575                             dotProduct += result.GetAt(matrixIndex) * result.GetAt(istd::CIndex2d(hhIndex, matrixIndex[1]));
00576                      }
00577 
00578                      double reflexionFactor = 2 * dotProduct / hhVectorNorm2;
00579                      matrixIndex[1] = hhIndex;
00580                      result[matrixIndex] -= hhVector0 * reflexionFactor;
00581                      for (matrixIndex[1]++; matrixIndex[1] < size[1]; ++matrixIndex[1]){
00582                             result.GetAtRef(matrixIndex) -= result[istd::CIndex2d(hhIndex, matrixIndex[1])] * reflexionFactor;
00583                      }
00584               }
00585 
00586               result.SetAt(istd::CIndex2d(hhIndex, hhIndex), -hhLength);
00587               for (int i = hhIndex + 1; i < size[1]; ++i){
00588                      result.SetAt(istd::CIndex2d(hhIndex, i), 0);
00589               }
00590        }
00591        return true;
00592 }

00594 
00595 template <class Element>
00596 bool TVarMatrix<Element>::GetSolvedTriangle(const TVarMatrix<Element>& vector, TVarMatrix<Element>& result, Element accuracy) const
00597 {
00598        istd::CIndex2d size = GetSizes();
00599 
00600        I_ASSERT(vector.GetSize(1) >= size[0]);
00601        I_ASSERT(size[1] >= size[0]);
00602 
00603        int columnsCount = vector.GetSize(0);
00604     result.SetSizes(istd::CIndex2d(columnsCount, size[0]));
00605 
00606        istd::CIndex2d resultIndex;
00607        for (resultIndex[0] = 0; resultIndex[0] < columnsCount; ++resultIndex[0]){
00608               for (resultIndex[1] = size[0] - 1; resultIndex[1] >= 0; --resultIndex[1]){
00609                      Element diagonalElement = GetAt(istd::CIndex2d(resultIndex[1], resultIndex[1]));
00610                      if (::fabs(diagonalElement) < accuracy){
00611                             return false;
00612                      }
00613 
00614                      Element previousProduct = 0.0;
00615                      for (int i = size[0] - 1; i > resultIndex[1]; i--){
00616                             previousProduct += result.GetAt(istd::CIndex2d(resultIndex[0], i)) * GetAt(istd::CIndex2d(i, resultIndex[1]));
00617                      }
00618 
00619                      result.SetAt(resultIndex, (vector.GetAt(resultIndex) - previousProduct) / diagonalElement);
00620               }
00621        }
00622 
00623     return true;
00624 }
00625 
00626 
00627 template <class Element>
00628 bool TVarMatrix<Element>::GetSolvedLSP(const TVarMatrix<Element>& vector, TVarMatrix<Element>& result, Element accuracy) const
00629 {
00630        TVarMatrix<Element> matrixR;
00631        TVarMatrix<Element> matrixQY;
00632 
00633        if (GetTriangleDecomposed(matrixR, &vector, &matrixQY, -1, accuracy)){
00634               return matrixR.GetSolvedTriangle(matrixQY, result, accuracy);
00635        }
00636 
00637        return false;
00638 }

00641 template <class Element>
00642 void TVarMatrix<Element>::GetColumnVector(int columnIndex, TVarVector<Element>& result)
00643 {
00644        I_ASSERT(columnIndex < m_sizes[0]);
00645 
00646        result.SetElementsCount(m_sizes[1]);
00647 
00648        istd::CIndex2d index(columnIndex, 0);
00649 
00650        for (; index[1] < m_sizes[1]; ++index[1]){
00651               result[index[1]] = GetAt(index);
00652        }
00653 }

00656 template <class Element>
00657 void TVarMatrix<Element>::GetRowVector(int rowIndex, TVarVector<Element>& result)
00658 {
00659        I_ASSERT(rowIndex < m_sizes[1]);
00660 
00661        result.SetElementsCount(m_sizes[0]);
00662 
00663        istd::CIndex2d index(0, rowIndex);
00664 
00665        for (; index[0] < m_sizes[0]; ++index[0]){
00666               result[index[0]] = GetAt(index);
00667        }
00668 }

00670 
00671 template <class Element>
00672 bool TVarMatrix<Element>::Serialize(iser::IArchive& archive)
00673 {
00674        bool retVal = true;
00675 
00676        static iser::CArchiveTag sizeTag("Size", "Size of matrix");
00677        static iser::CArchiveTag cellsTag("Cells", "Values of matrix cells");
00678 
00679        retVal = retVal && archive.BeginTag(sizeTag);
00680        if (archive.IsStoring()){
00681               istd::CIndex2d size = GetSizes();
00682 
00683               retVal = retVal && archive.Archive(size[0]);
00684               retVal = retVal && archive.Archive(size[1]);
00685        }
00686        else{
00687               istd::CIndex2d size;
00688 
00689               retVal = retVal && archive.Archive(size[0]);
00690               retVal = retVal && archive.Archive(size[1]);
00691 
00692               if (!retVal){
00693                      return false;
00694               }
00695 
00696               SetSizes(size);
00697        }
00698        retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(sizeTag);
00699 
00700        retVal = retVal && archive.BeginTag(cellsTag);
00701        for (Iterator iter = Begin(); iter != End(); ++iter){
00702               retVal = retVal && archive.Archive(*iter);
00703        }
00704        retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(cellsTag);
00705 
00706        return retVal;
00707 }
